name: Fragile Ego
description:
So you can create a couple of different rooms with different purposes.

All the units have different stats and cost different amounts.

I tried to make it as easy to understand as possible.

Left click interacts, right click and drag moves the camera.

Arrow keys move the camera left and right too.

If you run out of treasure, you lose.  Always keep an eye on it.

There's a few bugs that randomly pop up.  I haven't found any game breaking bugs yet, except one - always create a room when you first start.  If you place the Tavern straight away, you can't place any more rooms at all...

Have fun!

Oh and enjoy the music, it was made for the game by an awesome musician, Nolan!
